definitions.definition: ( criminal law ) A person who has committed a felony ( “ serious criminal offence ” ) ; specifically, one who has been tried and convicted of such a crime .
( obsolete ) An evil or wicked person; also ( by extension ) a predatory animal regarded as cruel or wicked.

main_definition: ( criminal law ) A person who has committed a felony ( “ serious criminal offence ” ) ; specifically, one who has been tried and convicted of such a crime .
secondary_definitions: ( obsolete ) An evil or wicked person; also ( by extension ) a predatory animal regarded as cruel or wicked.

definitions.definition: A small infected sore ; an abscess , a boil ; specifically, a whitlow ( “ infection near or under the cuticle of a fingernail or toenail ” ) .

main_definition: ( pathology , veterinary medicine ) A small infected sore ; an abscess , a boil ; specifically, a whitlow ( “ infection near or under the cuticle of a fingernail or toenail ” ) .
